channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: All parking signs have been sprayed, 27th February
item.description:
All parking signs located on Crozier Terrace, E9 6AJ have been covered with black spray. It has gotten to the point where actual residents that have paid, can not park because of unauthorised parking but others

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Crozier Terrace, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New Kent road, 27th February
item.description:
Outside petrol station on eastbound carriageway. This has been flagged up as having been fixed, when it has not. Please check and then fix it! Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 197-209, New Kent Road, Walworth, Greater London

item.title: Issue made worse, 27th February
item.description:
Yesterday I reported graffiti writing on the wall of my house. Today I received notification that the issue had been rectified. In fact it has been made worse and more conspicuous. Instead of removing the writing, entire stretches of brickwork have been painted black, looking even worse than before. Please remove this black paint if it was to be painted over, surely it should’ve been painted with something less conspicuous on the red brickwork.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandford Road, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large tree branch snapped, 27th February
item.description:
A large part of the top of the tree has snapped and is hanging down from the top is caught on other branches - this could and probably will fall at any point. It’s on the path so potential risk to pedestrians and vehicles

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Portland Avenue, Blackfen, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
